item.title: log / 231020-live_on_the_radio_again
item.description: live on the radio, again, making noise with small boxes. doing bit for fundraising at the radio station...

item.title: log / 220622-another_live_radio_performance
item.description: one month ago i did a live drone set on the radio in advance of drone day(may 28)

item.title: log / 220129-abiding
item.description:
2022
life carries on.
still on the radio, still making sounds...

item.title: log / 211007-live_radio_performance
item.description: i did a live on-air performance during our community radio annual fundraising drive

item.title: log / 211004-soundwalk_stuff
item.description: some things packed in preparation for an electromagnetic soundwalk livestream that I did yesterday afternoon.

item.title: log / 210927-sound_shenanigans
item.description: playing around with some gadgets, making drone sounds.

item.title: log / 210921-i_gave_a_workshop
item.description: i gave a workshop about midi last night. it went rather well, but in hindsight i feel that i went a tad overboard in my prep.

item.title: log / 210911-a_visit_to_the_countryside
item.description: i've stopped in at a friend's acreage for a visit, and a small concert tonight. tomorrow it's onward to brandon mb, and prairiewires 2021!

item.title: log / 210905-preparation
item.description: i've been getting ready for a synth meetup/festival lately. I built a new modular in one of my old typewriter cases, and added some other outboard stuff. This will also be my first use of my ETC video synth in a live setting. Receiving MIDI derived from a couple of modular cv signals, no less.

item.title: log / 210829-a_night_out_with_friends
item.description:
last night i performed at nuit blanche regina with my friends Jeff Morton and Edie Skeard. we call ourselves Bell Dreams

the event was held in and around regina's warehouse district. we were situated at site 8, acme welding, in front of their metal storage rack.

this was my first live outing since march 2020!

item.title: log / 210828-an_observation
item.description:
lately i've been working with a patch in a small modular case. the results have been varied, but ultimately good.

I recently revisited the use of the piezothings with the old zither with great results. I might have to bring this gear along on the eastern campaign(a gig in brandon mb in september, yorkton sk in october, and guelph on in november)
